name: Trello: show card ID on hover
description: When hovering over a card in Trello, the ID of the card appears in the bottom right corner of the card. Useful to make a link to the card. Note: on single line cards, it will be a bit hidden behind the "edit" crayon icon, but still visible.
additional_info: How to make a link to a card: Let's say you want to make a link to card with number "34" (number visible when you hover over the card, with this user style installed). Then all you have to do is type #34 (pound sign + the number) in the description of another card, and it will automatically create a link to the first card. Note: links only work within a same board, and if you use the "#" for a header in a description, it will not be a link. Add any text before it to make it a link.
